properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 6 at 7:03PM CST until January 11 at 7:12PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock
and Dam...

.Water levels remain above flood stage but continue to fall on the
Tombigbee River at Bevill Lock and Dam and at Gainesville Lock and
Dam. The Tombigbee River is cresting just below moderate flood stage
at Demopolis Lock and Dam and will begin to slowly fall Tuesday
night. Flood warnings remain in effect at all three locations.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam.
* until Saturday evening...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 6:15 PM Monday the stage was 76.6 feet.
* Flood stage is 68.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 76.7 feet by
tomorrow morning. The river will fall below flood stage Saturday
morning.
* Impact...At 77.0 feet...Flooding of numerous cabins and trailers
near the river can be expected.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Tuesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
